inkball

Class Spawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.GameObject
      • inkball.Spawner

  • public class Spawner
extends GameObject
    The spawner class is a subclass of the GameObject class, it represents the spawner object in the game, which spawns ball objects at regular intervals based on the ballsToSpawn list

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class inkball.GameObject

        sprite, x, y

        y - y-coordinate of the spawner

        spawnInterval - interval at which the spawner spawns balls
        ballsToSpawn - list of balls to spawn
